pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$()$(br)Gives hunger if you haven't attacked something recently.$(br2)Higher levels have a shorter cooldown window and make the hunger worse.$(br2)$(bold)Maximum Level:$() 5

$(bold)Level 1:$()$(br)$(li)Cost:$(br)$(li2)-10 Upgrade Points$(br)$(li)Effect:$(br)$(li2)+0.02 Food Exhaustion$(br)$(li2)30 sec. delay$(br2)$(bold)Level 2:$()$(br)$(li)Cost:$(br)$(li2)-20 Upgrade Points$(br)$(li)Effect:$(br)$(li2)+0.04 Food Exhaustion$(br)$(li2)30 sec. delay$(br2)

$(bold)Level 3:$()$(br)$(li)Cost:$(br)$(li2)-35 Upgrade Points$(br)$(li)Effect:$(br)$(li2)+0.06 Food Exhaustion$(br)$(li2)30 sec. delay$(br2)$(bold)Level 4:$()$(br)$(li)Cost:$(br)$(li2)-50 Upgrade Points$(br)$(li)Effect:$(br)$(li2)+0.08 Food Exhaustion$(br)$(li2)25 sec. delay$(br2)
$(bold)Level 5:$()$(br)$(li)Cost:$(br)$(li2)-75 Upgrade Points$(br)$(li)Effect:$(br)$(li2)+0.10 Food Exhaustion$(br)$(li2)20 sec. delay
